name: Sniper Duels
description:
Outsmart your opponent by predicting their next move and building your strategy around it!

Game rules:

  • Each player needs a deck of 5 cards, which can be created in the Collection;
  • Each turn consists of 3 phases: 
    • Red Player's turn;
    • Green Player's turn;
    • Action Phase;
  • On the first round each player chooses 3 cards from their deck; the rest 2 cards form a Reserve;
  • On the second and third rounds each player MUST swap 1 card from the hand with 1 card from the Reserve;
  • On their turn the Player can perform 1 Main Action and/or 1 Utility Action by choosing the cards whose effects will be triggered on the Action Phase; the opponent should turn away from the screen;
  • Instead of performing a Utility Action player can move like the King in chess;
  • Order IS important: your movement will change card's avaliable targets;
  • On the Action Phase both players observe the results of their turns simultaneously;
  • To win a round you need to kill your opponent (deal 4 damage).

The English version is on the way.
